concept.title: Introduction
concept.shortdesc: This user guide is intended to help acquaint the Customer Support Agents install and work on OBS Studio.

conbody.p: OBS Studio is a free and open source software for screen recording and live streaming. For agents, OBS Studio can be incredibly useful in several ways as it offers:

li.p: Compatibility for Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems.
Multiple-screen recording while the agents are on call with customers.
Pause recording button to avoid capturing sensitive information of customers.
